member.name: M:AspNet.Identity.RavenDB.Stores.RavenUserStore`1.CreateAsync(`0)
member.remarks: This method doesn't perform uniquness. That's the responsibility of the session provider.

member.name: M:AspNet.Identity.RavenDB.Stores.RavenUserStore`1.UpdateAsync(`0)
member.remarks: This method assumes that incomming TUser parameter is tracked in the session. So, this method literally behaves as SaveChangeAsync
